post.summary: Create a user and return the authentication token

201.description: Created - User created and token returned

post.summary: Authenticate a user and return a token

200.description: OK - Login completed successfully and returned token

get.summary: Verify a the authentication and return the data of decoded token (userId and role)

200.description: OK - Authentication completed sucessfully and returned the data of decoded token (userId and role)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The value to search cakes by name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, starting from 1. Used for paginating results

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Defines the sorting criteria for the results. Options: 'popularity' (most popular first), 'latest' (newest first), 'price_high_to_low' (highest price first), 'price_low_to_high' (lowest price first)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Values to filter the cakes by the type

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Values to filter the cakes by the category

parameters.name: frosting
parameters.description: Values to filter the cakes by the frosting

parameters.name: filling
parameters.description: Values to filter the cakes by the filling

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Values to filter the cakes by the size

200.description: OK - Returned the paginated list of cakes

post.description: It's an admin route, only accessible with a valid admin user's token

cake.description:
A cake object to be sent as a JSON string. Check the schema **CakeToBodyOfCreateRoute** for more details about the cake object to be stringified as JSON.

**NOTE**: All the type, categories, fillings and frosting need to be registered in the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cake to return

404.description: Not Found - This cake doesn't exists

patch.summary: Update a cake and return the cake updated

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cake to update

cake.description:
A cake object to be sent as a JSON string. Check the schema **CakeToBodyOfUpdateRoute** for more details about the cake object to be stringified as JSON.

**NOTES**: All the properties are optional and all the type, categories, fillings and frosting need to be registered in the database

InternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server

BadRequest.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or missing required fields or params
